name: Mike Bahoura
text: Ordered 2 large pizzas at 9:35pm and I know they close at 10pm.  I specifically told them that if it was too late for a delivery, then I would come and pick it up myself.  They assured me they could deliver in 30-40 min.  Of course, they ‚Ä¶More

name: mark wood
text: Always quick accurate pizza here. Longest time waited has been 15 min. Usually done in 10

name: Clark Manwaring
text:
EXCELLENT customer service! Thanks Dominique and Troy, you guys are the best!

-Clark @The Ready Store

name: John Womack
text: From the moment  you arrive in this restaurant  the personel give you an enjoyable feeling. Very friendly stuff, it is a good place to go out with your friends or with your date. Great  cooking, qualified  chief cook and stuff, reasonable  pay and courteous  service. Highly recommended.

name: Tony Hann
text: I got a medium Pizza two toppings 846 sesame cross and the pizza was great

name: Ed Stroble
text: Love their subs and they're inexpensive

name: David Lumsden
text: This store is the best. I love the pizza, but the service at this location is the best I've ever had. Fast, friendly and great product. Employees are great at what they do. Cudos to management and ownership for hiring such great people and thank you to all employees for providing such great service!

name: David Arnold
text: Would surely recommend trying this spot. Great character, fresh dishes, excellent service. I recommend this place.

name: Michael Bergeron
text: This place always delivers. They serve good dishes for fair prices, there is no waiting time even when the place is full.

name: Sedona Roberts
text: Best gluten free pizza around! Plus the staff is always super nice and caring with orders.

name: Brooke Gregory
text: They forgot my cinnamon sugar stick icing.

name: Chaz Lon
text: Pizza arrived march 16 at around 230 pm UNSLICED.

name: Silvia K
text: Love their pizza and Italian subs!

name: Jean-paul Panfiloiu
text: Ordered from here about 20 times. This is the 4th time they call me and ask me to come to their car to grab the pizza. The whole point of Delivery is to get it brought to your door. I lived in Chicago, NYC in Big buildings always had food delivered to the door. 3.75 delivery fee +tip expected. Time to find another pizzeria.

name: T Thompson
text: Just ordered a large deep dish meat lovers pizza and it was raw dough in the middle.  Had a bad experience years ago and decided to try it again.  Bad decision.  We also had a round cheese pizza.  It was not raw but had a gallon of sauce on ‚Ä¶More

text: Literally the worst pizza I have ever ordered. We ordered the pizzas well done and they were raw and doughy. Ate one piece and ended up throwing it in the trash. No more Hungry Howie's for us.

text: Traditional franchise pizza.  Expect greasy, but not skimpy on the pepperoni and cheese, pizza.  Didn't try the deep dish, went with traditional round.

name: Karry Evans
text: The pizza I ordered was missing 3 items I paid.  Did not realized until I got home.  I ordered the pizza at the counter and they cannot make what I ordered from the counter to where they make pizza.

text: Rude, insensitive, careless, and selfcentered workers. Only reason they are still in business is because it‚Äôs the only pizza place within 5 miles. Hate them.

text: Horrible Both times i ordered they forgot something. One of the managers told me she would give me a  free small pizza credit now when i call they wont honor it and dont care. Rude people there looks like its ran by little kids. the manager that lied to me her name was caty
